sentences.en: But why cover your car in sod?
sentences.cn: 不过为什么要盖上一层草皮呢？

sentences.en: Can be used to assay SOD activity by means of pyrogallol oxidation?
sentences.cn: 邻苯三酚自氧化法适于测定sod活性 吗 ?

sentences.en: Contain the essence, SOD of abundant grape, mighty anti - oxygenation defer decrepitude.
sentences.cn: 富含葡萄籽精华 、 SOD, 超强的 抗氧化 作用于延缓衰老.

sentences.en: He preferred the cleanness and tidiness of the wild sod.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢荒野草地的清洁和整齐.

sentences.en: I do not care a sod for what people think.
sentences.cn: 别人怎么想,我全不在乎.

sentences.en: It's Sod's Law that it rains on the only day I can play tennis.
sentences.cn: 我打网球的那天偏偏就下雨,倒霉事真躲也躲不开.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the effect of superoxide dismutase ( SOD ) on chronic actinic dermatitis ( CAD ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨超氧化物歧化酶 ( SOD ) 在慢性光化皮炎 ( CAD ) 中的作用.

sentences.en: Sod seeding is now a practicable proposition on permanent pastures of the better soils.
sentences.cn: 在有比较优良的土壤的永久草场上,草皮播种是一项可行的事.

sentences.en: Sod this radio! Why won't it work?
sentences.cn: 讨厌的收音机! 怎么成了哑巴啦?

sentences.en: The intracellular concentration of 2,3 DPG , ATP and SOD of erythrocyte were measured.
The playground was covered with sod.
The poor old sod got the sack yesterday.
sentences.cn: 那位可怜的老兄昨天给解雇了。

sentences.en: This kind of thick grass is called sod.
This was sod's law: when the spare tyre is in use, you will have a puncture.
sentences.cn: 这真是墨菲法则：一用备用轮胎，保准扎孔。

sentences.en: To thy high requiem become a sod.
sentences.cn: 如一块草皮对你的安魂曲。

sentences.en: We always play better when we are not being recorded—but that's Sod's Law, isn't it?
sentences.cn: 我们总是不录音的时候演奏得好些—不过这也是常理，越该做好的时候越做不好，是不是？

sentences.en: With a good shovel, you can cut an outline of the garden in the grass. Your child can then pull the sod away and set it aside it for composting.
sentences.cn: 先用铲子在草地上划出一个菜园的轮廓，教孩子们把草皮推到一边作堆肥——这是一个让他们了解自然界物质循环利用的好机会。

sentences.en: You are the dirty, vile, treacherous sod.
sentences.cn: 你是个卑鄙 、 恶劣 、 奸诈的酒鬼.

words.tran_cn: （用以加强语气）见鬼的；他妈的
草皮的；被草皮遮覆著的
以草泥堆砌筑成的房屋

trans.tran_cn: 草地，草皮，<俗，谑>人，家伙，故乡，本国，<英俚>鸡奸者，兽奸者
trans.tran_en: a piece of earth or the layer of earth with grass and roots growing in it

trans.tran_cn: 铺草皮，以生草土覆盖，铺草皮于
